title: Sudden Realization in......

replies.body:
You forgot one: http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/hyperdimensionneptunia/images/f/f3/Compa3.png/revision/latest?cb=20130527192254

Her name is Compa from Hyperdimension Neptunia... Compa is the personification of the company Compile Heart. And in that game there are many other personified video game companies, systems, even video game series, made into characters.

In fact http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/hyperdimensionneptunia/images/8/83/IFVictory.png/revision/latest?cb=20151120235740 IF, also from Hyperdimension Neptunia, has the same voice actor as new {{champion:78}} ! IF is the personification of Idea Factory, which is the parent company of Compile Heart.

IF is the personification of Idea Factory, which is the parent company of Compile Heart.

I thought I was the only one that liked that game >:P

1: Well this is a first for me getting a RIOTER reply. And you are not alone. Just remember: Nep Nep is love, Nep Nep is life.

http://www.capsulecomputers.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/hyperdimension-neptunia-gif-01.gif

ANYWAYS! I picked it up back when it came out on the PS3. Maybe late, but still. Was well worth it! Now I am thinking of getting the WHOLE RE:Birth series, and the anime that was made as well. That might cost me an arm and a leg or two though! XD

> [{quoted}](name=Bow hunter 16,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=O5pEvkQW,comment-id=000100020000,timestamp=2015-12-24T06:59:33.546+0000)
>
> 1: Well this is a first for me getting a RIOTER reply. And you are not alone. Just remember: Nep Nep is love, Nep Nep is life.
> 
> http://www.capsulecomputers.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/hyperdimension-neptunia-gif-01.gif
> 
> ANYWAYS! I picked it up back when it came out on the PS3. Maybe late, but still. Was well worth it! Now I am thinking of getting the WHOLE RE:Birth series, and the anime that was made as well. That might cost me an arm and a leg or two though! XD

I'm in the same boat. The gameplay was hard to get into but I love the story. Just got the RE:Birth series on steam and hopefully that fixes a lot. I didn't even know about the anime!

Such a wacky group of lovable characters too. And the fact that every obtainable/playable character is a personification of a gaming company, console, hand-held, or even a video game series made it even funnier! At times it DID get a little weird though... But totally worth it. You can get the anime on [Barnes & Noble](http://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/dvd-hyperdimension-neptunia-animation-comp-ova/28666091?ean=0704400093319)! Though that alone is about $55. But seeing the characters like that and with the original VAs from the game will be worth the price.

> [{quoted}](name=Bow hunter 16,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=O5pEvkQW,comment-id=00010002000000000000,timestamp=2015-12-24T09:05:10.663+0000)
>
> Such a wacky group of lovable characters too. And the fact that every obtainable/playable character is a personification of a gaming company, console, hand-held, or even a video game series made it even funnier! At times it DID get a little weird though... But totally worth it. You can get the anime on [Barnes & Noble](http://www.barnesandnoble.com/w/dvd-hyperdimension-neptunia-animation-comp-ova/28666091?ean=0704400093319)! Though that alone is about $55. But seeing the characters like that and with the original VAs from the game will be worth the price.

That's what sold me on it. I love ambitious or original concepts (being a concept artist this isn't much of a surprise I guess) even if the execution is clunky. Same reason I listen to Coheed & Cambria OOOOOH snap.

Did I ever mention you're my favorite Rioter?

You're my favorite Rioter.

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=O5pEvkQW,comment-id=0001000200000000000000000001,timestamp=2015-12-24T21:54:52.236+0000)
>
> Did I ever mention you're my favorite Rioter?
> 
> You're my favorite Rioter.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Original concepts can be really cool and awesome to see! I only really got into it when I noticed that NIS was in on it too. Then I meet NISA in game...

http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/neptunia/images/0/0b/Nisa.png/revision/latest?cb=20120218184514 Gods was she a hilarious character! Reminded me a lot of Laharl and Etna rolled into one... That's kinda scary now that I think about it.

What about MAGES, the ultimate Steins;Gate reference?
http://i.imgur.com/q67C3k6.jpg
http://img11.deviantart.net/4021/i/2013/327/f/b/mages__kurisu_makise_by_haruhi_chan4ever-d6v97nc.png
Sorry never played that. Or heard of it until now.
I have mixed feelings about Idea Factory.  Their gameplay is bland at best, but they tend to make charming characters and silly and light hearted stories.
i know a friend playing it. It seems like an incredibly silly and amazing set of games
+1 nep for you

Nep Nep is love, Nep Nep is life.

Other Hyperdimension Neptunia characters that are also voices of League champions:

{{champion:99}} has the same VA as Rom http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/neptunia/images/e/e8/Rom-DLC.png/revision/latest?cb=20140319183539
{{champion:222}} has the same VA as Uni http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/neptunia/images/5/55/Uni-DLC.png/revision/latest?cb=20140319183403
{{champion:89}} has the same VA as Blanc http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/neptunia/images/c/cd/Blanc_V2.png/revision/latest?cb=20151031025457
{{champion:55}} has the same VA as Vert http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/neptunia/images/3/34/Vert_V2.png/revision/latest?cb=20151028022535
Finally {{champion:37}} and {{champion:40}} has the same VA as Noire http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/neptunia/images/4/4e/Noire_V2.png/revision/latest?cb=20151030075834

Way more CPUs and their little sisters. Only one who doesn't have a little sister is Vert.

UniJinx bat crazy gun maniac top tier

JInx's "sister" she keeps talking about might be Noire. =P

5 points for those that know why I meantioned Noire as the "sister", and 5 more points for why Vert doesn't have a sister CPU! Also: The points don't matter.
Vert attempts to steal Nepgear sometimes, doesn't that count XD
I think vert doesn't have a little sister because she's the console that never got made.

Vert is the personification of the XBox 360. Which is made by Microsoft, hence why she doesn't have a sister CPU candidate. The sister CPU candidates are all hand-held consoles. Ram and Rom being the 3DS, Uni being the PSP, and Nepgear is based off the Sega Game Gear.
Ah, cool.  That's a little funny because MS was toying with a hand-held xbox (they went into tablets and smart phones instead) and sega dropped out of the console business.
The Planeptune candidates Neptune and Nepgear are based off thier old console and hand-held. Though made slightly fictitious making them more up-to-date like the others.

When i heard the poppy rework voice I had a mini nerd attack. Love the Neptunia series.

Also, last I checked Poppy/IF have the same voice actor as Sakura Haruno as well.

You are correct! XD I had the same reaction once I found out it WAS IF. Though I hadn't played Hyperdimension Neptunia for a while, when I first heard the PBE leaked lines I swore I had heard that voice before from a different game.
Vee is easily one of my favorite voice actressess, she does the cutest voices. She has a pretty nice singing voice too. I could listen to her all day.

wow i knew riven sounded familiar but i just assumed she had a somewhat common voice never thought it was FREAKING NOEL VERMILLION FROM BLAZEBLUE WOW! thats awesome thanks for sharing
Yay i'm not the only dumb person :D
She was also Mio in K-On!
Mio is best moeblob

I hate the fact you seem like a fun/nice person. I can't bring myself to like a Riven main though. 

You're giving me confused feelings.

There are actually quite a lot of League champions voiced by popular voice actors/have funny facts about them.

Ahri's voice actor voices multiple characters from Smite. 

This is Azir: http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/sonic/images/2/29/20140724235703!Sonic_Boom_Knuckles_2.png/revision/latest?cb=20141120011159

Lucian is Kog'maw, as well as Renekton. 

I actually recognize Vayne's voice actor as Pandora's from Kid Icarus Uprising, as well as being also apparently Sticks from Sonic Boom.
I only know Riven (and I  assume the one with two guns is from Street fighter?)
Noel from Blazblue
Cristina Vee is my favorite voice actress I've ever heard.  Riven's voice is the best in my opinion, and I also really love her Homura.  I've met her and got her autograph many times.

http://statici.behindthevoiceactors.com/behindthevoiceactors/_img/actors/actor_556.jpg
"Hi, my name is Jamieson Price. You may recognize me as the voice of many characters, including those such as:
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/nurarihyonnomago/images/d/d7/Gyuki.png/revision/latest?cb=20111022190410
Gyuki Nura, from Rise of the Yokai Clan and
http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/pokemon/images/5/52/Giovanni_PO.png/revision/latest?cb=20140221071826
Giovanni, from Pokemon Origins. However, you most likely know me from a little game called League of Legends, where I voiced
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/mHIsFOD6wFI/hqdefault.jpg
Enjoy."

Btw super underratted VA. Doesn't change up the voice a lot but damn it is a good voice to listen too lol

This is weaboo as mundo
